hero.title: Transforming African Travel
hero.description: Hassle Free Local Payment Options with Lowest Prices!

service.heading: Services offered
service.description: Book Flights, Hotels, Cars, Trains & Events, Whether for Work or Play.

concierge.title: Concierge
concierge.description: Personalized assistance anytime, anywhere simplifying your lifestyle.

moneyexchange.title: Money exchange
moneyexchange.description: Fast, secure, and reliable currency exchange for global transactions.

esim.title: E-sim / Internet
esim.description: Stay connected globally with instant eSIM internet—fast, secure, reliable.

luggage.title: Extra luggage
luggage.description: Carry more with ease affordable extra luggage for your journey.

payment-section.title: Enjoy Secure & Flexible Payment Options
payment-section.description: We make paying for your travel easy and stress free. Choose from a wide range of trusted local and international payment methods as well as debit/credit cards

story-section.heading: Our Story
story-section.subheading: Born in Africa, Built for the World
story-section.description: What started as a simple idea for making travel across Africa easier, smarter, and more connected, has now taken form into a powerful and comprehensive booking platform. We’re a team of passionate travelers, tech innovators, and local experts united by a shared vision: to unlock the beauty, culture, and opportunity within Africa through seamless and convenient travel experiences.
story-section.highlight: This is more than a platform. It’s a movement. A celebration of Africa, built by Africans, for the world.

subscribe.title: Subscribe for Exclusive Flight Deals & Travel Tips
subscribe.description: Join our travel community and be the first to know about flash sales, last-minute discounts, and insider tips to make your journey smoother.
